SELECT a.customer_type cusType,count( b.agent_id ) num FROM ( SELECT 1 customer_type UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT agent_id,b1.customer_type FROM ${assistDataBase}.follow_agent b1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM agent WHERE del_status != - 1 ) b2 ON b1.agent_id = b2.id WHERE b1.follow_id = #{followId} AND b2.id IS NOT NULL ) b ON b.customer_type = a.customer_type GROUP BY a.customer_type

SELECT fam.type as fundRank,count(a.id) num from ( SELECT fa.agent_org_id, CASE WHEN IFNULL(useable + frozen + out_frozen + 0.8*cargo_interest+cargo_interest_puchas, 0) = 0 THEN 1 WHEN 0 < IFNULL(useable + frozen + out_frozen + 0.8*cargo_interest+cargo_interest_puchas, 0) and IFNULL(useable + frozen + out_frozen + 0.8*cargo_interest+cargo_interest_puchas, 0) <= 20000 THEN 2 WHEN 20000 < IFNULL(useable + frozen + out_frozen + 0.8*cargo_interest+cargo_interest_puchas, 0) and IFNULL(useable + frozen + out_frozen + 0.8*cargo_interest+cargo_interest_puchas, 0) <=100000 THEN 3 WHEN 100000 < IFNULL(useable + frozen + out_frozen + 0.8*cargo_interest+cargo_interest_puchas, 0) and IFNULL(useable + frozen + out_frozen + 0.8*cargo_interest+cargo_interest_puchas, 0) <=500000 THEN 4 WHEN 500000 < IFNULL(useable + frozen + out_frozen + 0.8*cargo_interest+cargo_interest_puchas, 0) and IFNULL(useable + frozen + out_frozen + 0.8*cargo_interest+cargo_interest_puchas, 0) <= 1000000 THEN 5 WHEN 1000000 < IFNULL(useable + frozen + out_frozen + 0.8*cargo_interest+cargo_interest_puchas, 0) and IFNULL(useable + frozen + out_frozen + 0.8*cargo_interest+cargo_interest_puchas, 0) <= 3000000 THEN 6 ELSE 7 END AS type FROM finance_account fa ) fam left join ( SELECT id from agent LEFT JOIN ( SELECT agent_id from ${assistDataBase}.follow_agent where follow_id = #{followId} )b on b.agent_id=agent.id where del_status != -1 and b.agent_id is not null )a ON a.id = fam.agent_org_id GROUP BY fam.type

select click_date as dateStr,sum(ifnull(in_cash,0))inCash from ( SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 1 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 2 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 3 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 4 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 5 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 6 day) as click_date union all SELECT date_sub(curdate(), interval 7 day) as click_date )a left join ( SELECT in_cash,date(create_time)date from ${assistDataBase}.follow_up_log where follow_id=#{followId} )b on a.click_date=b.date group by a.click_date
